[Fire Department](https://www.ennistx.gov/directory/FireDepartment)

The Ennis Fire Department is dedicated to promoting and protecting the health and safety of our residents and visitors. The department provides fire suppression, prevention and education, along with Advanced Life Support (ALS) first response from 3 stations, twenty-four hours a day, 365 day a year.

[Human Resources](https://www.ennistx.gov/directory/HumanResources)

The Human Resources Department partners with all City department heads to attract, develop, and retain the City's most valuable asset - employees! We strive to maintain a highly skilled and diversified workforce through continuous training, competitive benefits, and a culture of health and wellness. We are proud of providing the highest standard of customer service while fostering the city’s values of integrity, transparency, and fiscal responsibility.

Contact

[Planning, Development and Inspections](https://www.ennistx.gov/directory/PlanningDevelopment)

Facilitate and provide the tools necessary to plan and develop commercial and residential projects through approachable and compassionate City staff, using Zoning Ordinances (UDO) and Development Guidelines to ensure a safe and healthy community, and to provide equity and fairness to all.
Staff provides transparent and ethical service to help grow Ennis in a way we can continue our thriving economy and vibrant lifestyles.

Contact
Us Information
